creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
after running -link-to-parent in http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/ant/core/trunk/src/tests/antunit/core/dirscanner-symlinks-test.xml symlink fails to delete the link ${base}/A.

The reason is that symlink first renames the directory linked to and then tries to remove the link - but that way the link's name has changed and the File object points to a no longer existant file.
